name: Maximum Velocity (itch)
description:
LUDUM DARE 39 - Out of Power

You have a bomb inside you! 

If you go slower than 75KMH the bomb explodes...

To keep your speed, jump on other cars when your car run out of fuel, or you will slow down and EXPLODE!

You got to GO FAST!

Art, FX, Level design and Gamedesign : Rodrigo Dorta Marques

Programming, IA design , Gamedesign and audio: Bruno Dorta Marques

Main character : https://opengameart.org/content/cleaned-base-human-models

Sounds and Music:

Music: http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music

----------------------------------

0.2 - Changelog

Better FX

Fixed some loading issues

Improved jump mechanics

Reworked IA behaviour 

WEBGL build for browser play

-----------------------------------

Download the executable for better graphics and controller suport.

Best Played with a controller

Left Analog Stick Movement
B to jump
Right Trigger BOOST
Left Triger Brakes

W, A ,S, D Movement
Ctrl to Jump
Spacebar BOOST
Left Alt Brakes
